title: Yaro Yaro Lyrics Madha Yaanai Koottam Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Yaro Yaro
Singer(s): Haricharan, Monali Thakur
Music: N.R.Raghunanthan
Lyricist: Ekadasi
Movie: Madha Yaanai Koottam (2013)

Yaro yaro yaaridam yaaro
ooro pero theriyavillai.
yeno yeno idhuvarai yeno
ennakum adhudhaan puriyavillai.

Valigalil  vaasa pookkal vaarthidum
mazhigalil dhegam urugiyadhey.
nadhiyinil thondrum mega kottam
thalayinai vaari rasikiradhey.

Thaeneerin saayalai unnidam
paarthaeney nadakkayiley.
Naaldhorum usupiya nilavinai
ketteney paarkayile.  (Yaro yaro ...)

Valayal kaiyaaley vaasam thandhaaye
pasiyumillaamal nelindhirudhen.
Uruttum kannaaley uyirai eduthaaye
unnaku munnaaley thudithirundhen.
Nadhimeley midhakira pudhu alaiyaai
thalaikelaai therikiraai thirai nilavaai.

Kalavaadi pona uyir enathallava..
manam maarum enadhuyir unadhallavaa.
Aagaayam vilikura nerathil
oorellaam urangidudhey.
thoongaadha vizhigalin imaigal
unnai paarka thudikiradhey. (Yaro yaro ..)

Enadhu saamgam undahu ninaivaaley
thuliyum thoongaamal vilithirundhen.
udaindhu pogaamal enadhu naanaththai
uryiril pudhaithu kaathirrundhen.

Vidiyadha pozhudhukku vedi vaithaen.
onnaagi pogathaaney uyir vaithaen.
Idi vandhu ponaal kooda thadam illaye.
Idhayathil unnai vida yarumillaye.

Pudhidhaaga kulirkira megangal
mazhayaaga verkiradhey.
Thadumaarum vizhigalin padhaigal
yedhedho ketkiradhey..

Yaro yaro yaaridam yaaro
ooro pero theriyavillai.
yeno yeno idhuvarai yeno
ennakum adhudhaan puriyavillai.

Valigalil  vaasa pookkal vaarthidum
mazhigalil dhegam urugiyadhey.
nadhiyinil thondrum mega kottam
thalayinai vaari rasikiradhey.

Thaeneerin saayalai unnidam
paarthaeney nadakkayiley.
Naaldhorum usupiya nilavinai
ketteney paarkayile.  (Yaro yaro ...)
